name: .KFN File Extension
summary: Learn about .KFN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by KaraFun, a program for editing and playing back karaoke music; saved in a proprietary format and contains MIDI audio as well as lyrics text and display animation settings; used for playing karaoke songs.

content: KFN files can be exported to various multimedia formats using the KaraFun Editor, which is included with the KaraFun installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
